content:
What a thoughtful gift! Monthly gift box subscriptions can be a unique and exciting way to celebrate your best friend's birthday. Yes, many popular services offer personalized selections based on individual preferences, interests, or lifestyles. Here are some popular options to consider:

1. **Box of Style by Rachel Zoe**: This quarterly subscription box offers a curated selection of fashion, beauty, and lifestyle products tailored to your friend's personal style. You can take a style quiz to ensure the box is tailored to their tastes. ($99.99/quarter)
2. **FabFitFun**: This seasonal subscription box offers a range of products, including beauty, wellness, fashion, and home goods. You can take a survey to personalize the box based on your friend's preferences. ($49.99/season)
3. **Cairn**: If your friend loves the outdoors, Cairn is a great option. This monthly subscription box delivers a selection of outdoor gear, apparel, and accessories tailored to their interests and preferences. ($29.95/month)
4. **Book of the Month Club**: If your friend is an avid reader, consider a personalized book subscription. This service offers a curated selection of new releases, and you can choose from various genres to ensure the books align with their reading preferences. ($14.99/month)
5. **GlobeIn**: This monthly subscription box delivers a selection of artisanal, handmade products from around the world. You can choose from various themes, such as wellness, home decor, or fashion, to personalize the box. ($40/month)
6. **Scentbird**: If your friend loves fragrances, Scentbird offers a personalized perfume subscription service. They'll receive a new, curated fragrance every month based on their scent preferences. ($14.95/month)
7. **Pusheen Box**: This quarterly subscription box is perfect for fans of the popular comic character Pusheen. The box includes a selection of Pusheen-themed items, such as plush toys, apparel, and accessories. You can choose from various subscription options to personalize the box. ($39.99/quarter)
8. **Loot Crate**: If your friend is into gaming, sci-fi, or pop culture, Loot Crate offers a monthly subscription box with a curated selection of items, such as collectibles, apparel, and accessories. You can choose from various themes to personalize the box. ($19.99-$49.99/month)
9. **MistoBox**: This coffee subscription service offers a personalized selection of specialty coffee beans based on your friend's taste preferences. ($19.95-$39.95/month)
10. **Ipsy**: This monthly beauty subscription box offers a personalized selection of makeup, skincare, and hair care products based on your friend's beauty profile. ($10/month)

Before choosing a subscription service, consider your friend's interests, hobbies, and preferences to ensure the box is tailored to their tastes. Some services may also offer one-time gift options or the ability to pause or skip months, so be sure to review the terms and conditions before signing up.
